title: Nostalgic Environment
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hnn~, I haven’t had air like this for a long time! You can smell the grass and the animals! Thank you for inviting me today, Mari-chan. This is such a lovely ranch~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I’m glad you like it. I thought this kind of place would give you a sense of nostalgia, Emmacchi. I guess I was right to invite you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, it really is nostalgic! Do you come here often, Mari-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah, usually for horseback riding. Come on, let’s ride one together, Emmacchi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Aaaah~, the breeze feels so nice! Are you holding on okay, Emmacchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, I’m fine! It does feel good! It’s like I’m flying through the sky!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then let’s fly even faster! Haiyaaa~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ahahaha! Faster, faster~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
